RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Defendants: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Border Patrol agents: Jorge Luis Trevino and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Defendants: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.

Defendant who appeared to concede that the route taken would be convenient for smugglers and suggested alternative routes for smugglers to avoid detection, testified in a hearing about his vehicle not going off the road
Defendant involved in a case regarding alien smuggling, whose vehicle was stopped by Officer Reyes for failing to use a turn signal, and who appeared extremely nervous during the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Reymundo Reyes: Officer of the Freer Police Department who conducted a traffic stop on Ignacio Rodriguez's vehicle and observed that he was shaking and seemed extremely nervous
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who testified about the black truck and camper, and noted that smugglers often use rental cars to avoid losing their own vehicles if caught
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who questioned Defendant at the Border Patrol station
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Marco Montemayor: Special Agent who conducted an interview with Ignacio Rodriguez after he waived his Miranda rights
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.J. Scott Hacker: United States Magistrate Judge who considered the evidence presented in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alberto Ramirez: Director of Transportation, Planning and Development for the Texas Department of Transportation, Laredo Division
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Santiago Hinojosa: Manager with the Hertz rental car company at the Laredo International Airport
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Orona-Sanchez: Individual referenced in a court finding regarding alien smuggling using pickup trucks with camper shells
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRI: Defendants whose vehicles were stopped by law enforcement officers, and who were suspected of being involved in alien smuggling activities
